Fairness Forensics

A collection of projects for interrogating fairness of algorithmic systems

View on GitHub Add a Project

We’ve launched this site as a home to collect related projects. For now it’s just one of our own, but we have some more related projects in the works and hope that other people join us in adding projects to this site to make it a useful resources.

Fairness Forensics is maintained by Sarah M Brown and Christan Grant. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
